and date_format(anomaly.create_time,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') >= str_to_date(#{paramCondition.beginTime},'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') and date_format(anomaly.create_time,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') <= str_to_date(#{paramCondition.endTime},'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s')
